verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) In my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I cried <S%H7121><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And He answered <S%H6030><s%> me.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> from lying <S%H8267><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> From a deceitful <S%H7423><s%> tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to you, and what <S%H4100><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> shall be done <S%H3254><s%> to you, You deceitful <S%H7423><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>?
Sharp <S%H8150><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of the warrior, <S%H1368><s%> With the [burning] coals <S%H1513><s%> of the broom <S%H7574><s%> tree. <S%H7574><s%>
Woe <S%H190><s%> is me, for I sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> For I dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of Kedar! <S%H6938><s%>
Too long <S%H7227><s%> has my soul <S%H5315><s%> had its dwelling <S%H7931><s%> With those who hate <S%H8130><s%> peace. <S%H7965><s%>
I am [for] peace, <S%H7965><s%> but when <S%H3588><s%> I speak, <S%H1696><s%> They are for war. <S%H4421><s%>
